text: Fhe Bakɨme, ana nden farasegi, nde anan gumgi gu mbigi guari ma. Nde ŋgui vhɨrve gari guman panan rotu gari gumgi ma. Nde vhɨra ŋgarav Fhe Bakɨmen gumgi gu mbigi guari ma. Nde Fhe Bakɨme wora mbuigi gumgi gu mbigi ma. Nde, Fhe Bakɨme nde muuŋgi tɨvir vhuuiŋ guarira, nde nta bun suanga. Fhe Bakɨme nden kamgim, nde fhum kegi gɨngɨn, nde ana thagim, ana nde ndigap won vhava ŋaarar zɨgi. Mba vhavar ŋaar, ana guigira vhavar ŋaara vhuuŋ ma.
